scripts.build:prod:darwin:win32: echo "Build not supported on Windows and macOS"
scripts.image:docker:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker build --ulimit nofile=5000:5000 $(echo $(build-env swfBuilderImageEnv.buildTag) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env swfBuilderImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env swfBuilderImageEnv.account)/$(build-env swfBuilderImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg BASE_IMAGE_URL=$(build-env swfBuilderImage.baseImageUrl) ." --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image build."
